title: A Heroic Symphony Music Pack
description: Realistic orchestral epic music – a massive package featuring high-tension battle scores and slow ambient tunes. Dive into the symphony!
longDescription:
For years, I've been immersed in music production, working in the realms of cinema and film. I possess a collection of high-quality music in various libraries. My interest has now shifted to game music. Prior to creating this album, I spent hours learning Unreal Engine through tutorials, understanding how and where music is needed. I reached out to game developers, and within this album, you'll find lengthy tracks along with short loop options and solos of various instruments – a plethora of music cues to enhance your projects. I claim that these compositions will add joy to your games. Additionally, all music is YouTube-clear for your video use. Feel free to incorporate them into your content.

My website: https://tuncalicioglu.web.app/


Watermarked "Mythic Forges: A Heroic Symphony" Full Album: Youtube Full Album


A Heroic Symphony Music Pack


Immerse yourself in the grandeur of our latest musical masterpiece – "A Heroic Symphony Music Pack," meticulously crafted for the connoisseurs of AAA-class orchestral brilliance.


🎼 Musical Journey:

Embark on a 28-minute sonic odyssey across 14 full-length tracks, each a testament to the unwavering commitment to musical excellence. Let the symphony guide you through a mesmerizing landscape of emotions and sonic landscapes.


🔍 Seamless Loop Integration:

Featuring 25 seamlessly looped sections, our music pack provides an immersive experience, allowing game developers to seamlessly integrate these masterpieces into their projects. Elevate your gaming experience with the timeless beauty of orchestral music.


🎻 Orchestral Mastery:

Crafted with care in a high-quality home studio, 'A Heroic Symphony Music Pack' represents my dedication to orchestral excellence. Experience the rich tones of a full orchestra, making for a memorable auditory journey.


🎮 For Game Developers:

Designed with game developers in mind, we present "A Heroic Symphony Music Pack" as a resource for enhancing gaming soundscapes. Download and incorporate our symphony into your creations, adding a touch of unparalleled grandeur to your gaming worlds.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  15 unique tracks 
  • Over 26 tracks of seamless loops
  • High quality orchestral elements


Number of Audio Wavs: 41

Number of Audio Cues: 41

Sample rate / bit rate: 48,000 Hz / 24 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 28:01

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
